old.name: Fire Elementalist

passive.name: Ignition Spark
passive.description: Allied creatures near the Fire Elementalist capture Altar faster.

passive.name: Enduring Flame
passive.description: Damaging burning enemies heals the Fire Elementalist.

passive.name: Blazing Momentum
passive.description: When you or your creatures kill a Burning enemy, recharge Elemental spells.

primary.name: Flame Strikes
primary.description: Burns enemies with powerful Fire attacks.

defense.name: Fiery Dash
defense.description: Performs an invincible dash in a chosen direction.

ultimate.name: Burning Conquest
ultimate.description: Captures a territory, inflicts Fire damage and fully infuses allied units and Titans with Fire.

old.description: A Conqueror who burns enemies with powerful fire attacks, cleaving through ranks and empowering allies.

new.name: Fire Elementalist

old.name: Astral Monk

abilities.name: Arcane Alignment
abilities.description: All Astral spells recharge faster.

abilities.name: Last Light
abilities.description: All damage dealt is increased against targets below half health.

abilities.name: Cosmic Air
abilities.description: All flying creatures summoned by the Astral Monk are invisible.

abilities.name: Astral Fists
abilities.description: Pierces through enemies with colossal astral fists.

features.name: Combo Sequence
features.description: Alternates between Palm Strike (32) and Power Punch (47).

abilities.name: Veil Shift
abilities.description: Turns invisible and move faster.

abilities.name: Dimension of Varani
abilities.description: Conjures a time bubble that freezes enemy projectiles and creatures inside it. The Ultimate is destroyed by Lifestone Large Shots (3 hits).

old.description: A Duelist who strikes from the shadows with fast astral fists and time-bending abilities.

new.name: Astral Monk
